languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы сопоставили ключевые характеристики системы с данными астронавигационных карт. Мир Веабос-6 расположен именно здесь. Только вот авгуры отмечают странные изменения в атмосфере, похожие на массированный выброс отравляющих веществ. Выглядит так, словно с подземными хранилищами произошла какая-то... глобальная неприятность".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы сопоставили ключевые характеристики системы с данными астронавигационных карт. Мир Веабос-6 расположен именно здесь. Однако авгуры отмечают странные изменения в атмосфере, похожие на массированный выброс отравляющих веществ. Вероятная причина катастрофы — повреждение клапанов подземных хранилищ".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы сопоставили ключевые характеристики системы с данными астронавигационных карт. Мир Веабос-6 расположен именно здесь. Только вот авгуры отмечают странные изменения в атмосфере, похожие на массированный выброс отравляющих веществ. Выглядит так, словно с подземными хранилищами произошла какая-то... глобальная неприятность".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos-6 is located here, but augurs detect unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxic substances. The most likely cause for the catastrophe is damage to the underground storage facility valves."

"Lord Captain, we have referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos-6 is located here, but augurs detect unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxic substances. The most likely cause for the catastrophe is damage to the underground storage facility valves."

"Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos-VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

"Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos-VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

"Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们已经将这个星系的主要特征与天文数据图标进行了交叉比对。维博斯六号星就位于这个星系中。不过，俄歇矩阵探测到了行星大气中的异常变化，看起来像是某种有毒物质被大量释放。恐怕这颗行星的地下储存设施发生了变故。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们已经将这个星系的主要特征与天文数据图标进行了交叉比对。维博斯六号星就位于这个星系中。不过，俄歇矩阵探测到了行星大气中的异常变化，看起来像是某种有毒物质被大量释放。恐怕这颗行星的地下储存设施发生了变故。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos comparado las características principales del sistema con los datos de nuestra tabla astronáutica. El planeta Vheabos VI se encuentra aquí, pero hay un problema: los augures detectan un cambio inusual en su atmósfera similar a un escape gigantesco de toxinas. Parece que se ha producido un incidente desafortunado en las instalaciones de almacenamiento subterráneas del planeta».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos comparado las características principales del sistema con los datos de nuestra tabla astronáutica. El planeta Vheabos-VI se encuentra aquí, pero hay un problema: los augures detectan un cambio inusual en su atmósfera similar a un escape gigantesco de toxinas. Parece que se ha producido un incidente desafortunado en las instalaciones de almacenamiento subterráneas del planeta».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben die Hauptmerkmale des Systems mit unseren astronautischen Kartendaten abgeglichen. Der Planet Vheabos VI befindet sich hier. Das Problem ist, dass die Auguren eine ungewöhnliche Veränderung in der Atmosphäre feststellen, die einer massiven Freisetzung von Giftstoffen ähnelt. Es scheint, dass den unterirdischen Lagerstätten des Planeten etwas Unglückliches zugestoßen ist."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos-VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons croisé les principales caractéristiques du système avec les données de nos cartes astronautiques. La planète Vhéabos-VI se trouve bien ici. Le problème, c'est que les augures nous signalent un changement inhabituel dans son atmosphère. Ça ressemble à une libération massive de toxines. Il semble qu'un incident se soit produit dans les entrepôts souterrains de la planète. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons croisé les principales caractéristiques du système avec les données de nos cartes astronautiques. La planète Vhéabos-VI se trouve bien ici. Le problème, c'est que les augures nous signalent un changement inhabituel dans son atmosphère. Ça ressemble à une libération massive de toxines. Il semble qu'un incident se soit produit dans les entrepôts souterrains de la planète. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、星系の主な特徴と航宙図のデータを照らし合わせました。惑星ヴィアボス・VIはこの場所にあります。問題は、スキャナーが大量の毒素の放出とよく似た、大気の異変を感知したことです。惑星の地下貯蔵施設に、何かしら不幸があったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、星系の主な特徴と航宙図のデータを照らし合わせました。惑星ヴィアボス・VIはこの場所にあります。問題は、スキャナーが大量の毒素の放出とよく似た、大気の異変を感知したことです。惑星の地下貯蔵施設に、何かしら不幸があったのでしょう」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, sistemin başlıca karakteristik özellikleri ile uzaysal harita verileri arasında çapraz eşleştirme yaptık. Vheabos VI gezegeni burada bulunuyor. Sorun şu ki alametler; atmosferde devasa bir zehir salınımına benzer, olağan dışı bir değişim tespit ediyor. Gezegenin yeraltı depolama tesislerinin başına talihsiz bir şeyler gelmiş gibi görünüyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have cross-referenced the key characteristics of the system with our astronautical chart data. The planet Vheabos VI is located here. The problem is, the augurs detect an unusual change in the atmosphere not unlike a massive release of toxins. It appears that something unfortunate has happened to the planet's underground storage facilities."
